thread.title: Nike Air Huarache Arrives in New “Legion Green” Colorway
thread.title_full: Nike Air Huarache Arrives in New “Legion Green” Colorway

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Nike Air Huarache Arrives in New “Legion Green” Colorway
text:
Nike’s low-top Air Huarache has recently received an enticing “Legion Green” makeover.
The luxe iteration notes upper construction from suede, all while being contrasted underneath by a black rubber sole unit. The heel cage then matches the green-colored upper, while tonal laces accompany the release.
Lastly, Nike branding has been implemented on the tongue and heel cage.
You can pick up your size of the “Legion Green” Air Huarache now through select Swoosh stockists.
Buy Now / $158 Sneakerheads, also be sure to take a look at the list of stores that will be stocking the adidas YEEZY Boost 350 V2 “Zebra” this Saturday, February 25.
